p: The Vesicular stomatitis virus can induce strong cellular and humoral immune responses and has been used as a vector to protect against several viral infections [ 92, 93, 94]. The same study that tested ISFV as a vector used vesicular stomatitis virus serotype Indiana (VSIV) as a vector to deliver E3-E2-6K-E1 from VEEV strain ZPC 738 [ 75]. Like the rISFV-VEEV vaccine, rVSIV-VEEV conferred 100% protection against a homologous challenge in a mouse model. Evaluating the ultimate utility of this vaccine will require further testing with heterologous challenge strains: a common theme for most vaccines.
